document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b4d0b4">Sickness </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">this </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7cf0ff">World </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">most </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9ca0ff">occasions </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">When </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Best </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9ca0ff">Men </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7078ff">die. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5080ff">Wishfulness </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">their </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">far </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff7ae0">Condition </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">To </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5080ff">occupy. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8ff92">Chief </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0ff9e">indifference, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">as </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffb218">Foreign </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b4d0b4">World </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">must </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Themselves </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b4d0b4">forsake </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b4d0b4">contented </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">For </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffb218">Deity </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: A sickness of this world it most occasions
